body_html:
@fchollet Yes, training_utils.check_loss_and_target_compatibility() contains the same checks. Thank you for pointing out this.
By the way, I cannot figure out where the function has been used in tf.keras, so does we expect users do the check by themselves explicitly?

body:
@fchollet Yes, `training_utils.check_loss_and_target_compatibility()` contains the same checks. Thank you for pointing out this.
By the way, I cannot figure out where the function has been used in `tf.keras`, so does we expect users do the check by themselves explicitly?
